description:
As B.B.B. is preparing to go bug catching, Grandpa tells him that he was once called the bug catching king. He claims that he saw a bug of unbelievable proportions in the depths of the Amazon, but B.B.B. doesn`t believe him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: There It Is! The Monster Rhinoceros Beetle?!
出た, お化けカブトムシ!?
